title: image cache manager can delete used images

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bertrand-lallau

comments.content: This is actually a little complicated. The directory name is the instance name, which is based on the FLAGS.instance_name_template, but is stored in the database. I'm thinking that means that if you _change_ instance_name_template, but still have instances running from before the change, that you also change trust the flag. I'm thinking I need to check against the database in that piece of code.
